page.title: 14Lodge Farm,Stoke Golding.
page.content: Lodge Farm covers 212 acres of land and 13 acres are also rented. The farmer employs 2 full time men to help him. At the moment the farmer is in the process of draining part of the land. It is a typical farm of the area ,except that there are no milking cows.Instead lodge farm concentrates on breeding pigs.The largest pig on the farm weighs 600lbs. The piglets are not kept long on the farm but are sold to a farm specializing in fattening them.The pigs are kept enclosed because they do not consume as much food as if they were left loose. The farmers biggest problem concerning pests are rats,which are kept under control by the council. _
